duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform troubleshooting, preventive maintenance, repair, and ground testing of aircraft assemblies, systems, and surfaces.
Install, adjust, align, troubleshoot, and functionally test major and minor mechanical and pneudraulic systems on aircraft.
Coordinate the work of other mechanics and schedule maintenance activities to ensure completion of critical actions and workflow optimization.
Instruct lower graded mechanics and personnel in the disassembly and re-assembly of aircraft components.

education_certification.credential: Experience or training in aircraft maintenance and mechanical systems troubleshooting.
